meanings.definition: The act of organizing something again.
meanings.sent1: After the reorganization of my desk, I could find all my pens easily.
meanings.sent2: The company's reorganization led to a more efficient workflow.
meanings.sent3: The reorganization of the toy store made it look like a brand new place.
meanings.sent4: Her reorganization of the garden transformed it into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The reorganization of the library made it a cozy reading spot.

meanings.definition: The process of changing the structure or organization of something.
meanings.sent1: The reorganization of the team improved communication among members.
meanings.sent2: During the reorganization of the department, new roles were assigned.
meanings.sent3: The reorganization of the fridge made it easier to find snacks.
meanings.sent4: The reorganization of the city's traffic flow reduced congestion.
meanings.sent5: The reorganization of the schedule simplified everyone's tasks.
